definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Rejuvenation Bead no longer lists as building into Spirit Visage.
sentences.chinese: 活力宝珠的进阶物品处将不再显示精神之貌了。

sentences.english: I look forward to comparing notes on Advanced Transfiguration with you.
sentences.chinese: 我很期待能跟你一同讨论进阶变形学的笔记。

sentences.english: Its very hard for beginners to understand that your footwork is the key to improvement.
sentences.chinese: 初学者很难理解脚法对于进阶的重要性。

sentences.english: A pyrokineticist is a psionic prestige class.
sentences.chinese: 操焰者是一种心灵异能进阶职业。

sentences.english: The GM550 is a high-end model with many advanced functions.
sentences.chinese: GM550是一个具有多进阶功能的高阶血糖仪产品。

sentences.english: There is an advanced way of making yourself visible to this man.
sentences.chinese: 这里有个进阶的方法让你在他面前现形。

sentences.english: Twelve-style Boxing is advanced content for further improvement after Wuxing Quan (Five-element Boxing). During exercises, we just require true meanings not alike shapes.
sentences.chinese: 十二形拳是在五行拳之后为进一步提高的进阶内容。

sentences.english: A bulletin issued by that institute said: "An advanced course in English for foreign students."
sentences.chinese: 学院的招生公告写着，供外国学生的进阶英语课程。

sentences.english: Those are the prerequisites for the advanced classes, right?
sentences.chinese: 这些是修进阶课程前的必修课对吧？Correct。

sentences.english: Furthermore, we hope to provide a chance for in-depth learning for all who are interested in advance classes through "Master Workshops" before the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 并另有会前国际大师工作坊多样选择作深度进阶学习。

sentences.english: She was granted permission to begin upper-level coursework in Clearwater.
sentences.chinese: 她被准许在清水镇开始进阶课程了。

sentences.english: They remember being an advanced beginner.
sentences.chinese: 他们记得当时他成为一个进阶学习者的时候。

sentences.english: All of the following are class features of the initiate of the draconic mysteries prestige class.
sentences.chinese: 下面的是龙之传人这个进阶职业的特性。

sentences.english: The first step of the forehand progressions is to establish your contact point and then shadow the follow through.
sentences.chinese: 进阶正手的第一步是建立你的击球点及随后的随挥。

sentences.english: That is why I call it an advanced OBE technique.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么我称它为进阶出窍法。

sentences.english: In each section, specify additional support for these advanced features.
sentences.chinese: 在各章节中，指定这些进阶功能的额外支援。

definition: (of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
entrance door/to enter a door/introduction (to a subject)
